Talk_0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Ahem. I got a little carried away. Anyway,
people are working here, so please give
them some space.
Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>We do <clr:0000>critical work<clr:ffff> here that can't be
done anywhere else in the world. So I
understand why you're interested...
But this is a <clr:0000>Hudson Construction <clr:ffff>site.
Civilians should keep out.
Talk_0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>Huh?! Who are you?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>This is a <clr:0000>Hudson Construction <clr:ffff>site. We're
doing <clr:0000>critical work <clr:ffff>that can't be done
anywhere else. It's no place for civilians...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>Not to mention the falling ruins. Those are
incredibly dangerous—you really shouldn't
be here.
Talk_0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>Huh?!<sp:5:1:0> You again?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Didn't I tell you that this is a <clr:0000>Hudson
Construction <clr:ffff>site. We're doing <clr:0000>critical
work <clr:ffff>that can't be done anywhere else.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>Plus, ruins are still falling. Safety first!
This is no place for civilians.
Talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Do you have the capacity to build another
order of balloons? And would you be open
to accommodating a few design requests?
Talk_0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sad_00>Looks like I shouldn't bring up Mattison
right now...
Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>If you're headed to <clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff>, that
<clr:0000>railcar<clr:ffff> to the east is the quickest route.
Talk_0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Of course. We'll do whatever we can to
help with your research.
Talk_0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>More <clr:0000>Zonai artifacts<clr:ffff> fall here than
anywhere else. It's completely unrivaled!
Talk_0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Thank you! Oh, and how's <clr:0000>Mattison<clr:ffff>?
I heard she's moving soon.
Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_01>Look! See that? Only <clr:0000>three<clr:ffff> have been
found <clr:0000>on the surface<clr:ffff>!
Talk_0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Ahem. Anyway. This is a <clr:0000>Hudson
Construction<clr:ffff> work site!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>No civilians allowed.
Talk_0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>To someone on the Zonai Survey Team,
a site like this is a dream come true.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>Imagine rare research materials just
falling into your lap. Incredible!
Talk_0027: <sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_00>Huh? What are you still doing here?
Talk_0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>Hudson Construction is the number one
construction company!

And they don't only do buildings, like the
ones at <clr:0000>Lookout Landing<clr:ffff>...

They also build machinery, like the
<clr:0000>Skyview Towers<clr:ffff>. Amazing!

And just wait until you hear about their
latest invention...
Talk_0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_01>This <clr:0000>balloon<clr:ffff>!


Can you believe it was made using
<clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff>?
Talk_0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Chat_00>Purah has taken a keen interest in all the
<clr:0000>Zonai devices <clr:ffff>found here.<sp:0:4:0>So she asked Hudson to make this balloon
for the Zonai Survey Team to use.<sp:0:4:0>Thanks to this thing, the scope of our
research has broadened considerably!
Talk_0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Ahem. Anyway. As I was saying, we do
<clr:0000>critical work<clr:ffff> here.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>No civilians allowed.
